hero.title: DECOMPE
hero.subtitle: Digital Revolution Interface
hero.description: Enter a new era of digital design where innovation meets the interface of the future. Compete with young visionaries from Indonesia and create designs that will redefine the digital world!

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Revolutionary interface design for the digital future

community.title: Community
community.description: Join young visionaries from all over Indonesia

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: Create real change in the technology industry

about.title: Evolution of DECOMPE
about.subtitle: The journey of design innovation that inspires Indonesia's digital generation
about.themeDescription1: In the midst of an unstoppable digital revolution, the interface becomes the battlefield between humans and technology. DECOMPE 4.0 calls digital pioneers to create designs that are not only visually stunning, but also functionally transformative.
about.themeDescription2: This theme challenges us to design the future where every digital interaction becomes an unforgettable experience, every interface becomes a work of art, and every innovation becomes a legacy of civilization.
about.targetSubtitle: Who is ready to become an agent of digital change?

decompe1.title: DECOMPE 1.0
decompe1.subtitle: The Beginning
decompe1.description: Genesis era of digital design. The first foundation that built the UI/UX creativity ecosystem among Indonesian students.

decompe2.title: DECOMPE 2.0
decompe2.subtitle: Business Integration
decompe2.description: "Shaping Creative Business Technology" - Fusion between design, business strategy, and technology for comprehensive solutions.

decompe3.title: DECOMPE 3.0
decompe3.subtitle: Complete Ecosystem
decompe3.description: Complete ecosystem: intensive bootcamp, tight competition, and inspirational webinars for a full transformation experience.

digitalNatives.title: Digital Natives
digitalNatives.subtitle: High School Students
digitalNatives.description: Young generation born in the digital era, ready to explore the boundaries of technological creativity.

students.title: Students
students.subtitle: D3/D4/S1
students.description: Future professionals who want to sharpen skills and build their dream portfolio.

professionals.title: Professionals
professionals.subtitle: Fresh Graduate
professionals.description: Young professionals who want to improve competence and contribute to the industry.

hobbyists.title: Hobbyists
hobbyists.subtitle: Self-taught
hobbyists.description: Design enthusiasts who learn independently and want to measure their abilities in national competitions.

timeline.title: Mission Timeline
timeline.subtitle: Operational schedule for your digital revolution
timeline.importantDatesDesc: Mark these important dates to prepare for your digital revolution
timeline.readyToStartDesc: Don't miss the opportunity to become part of DECOMPE 4.0 - where digital dreams become reality.
timeline.trackJourney: Track our journey through each phase of the competition
timeline.trackJourneyMobile: Track our journey through each phase

registrationPeriod.title: Registration Period
registrationPeriod.description: Register now to get early bird discount and access to exclusive preparation materials.

selectionAnnouncement.title: Selection Announcement
selectionAnnouncement.description: Announcement of participants who passed the selection and group division for bootcamp.

bootcampTraining.title: Bootcamp Training
bootcampTraining.description: Intensive training with expert mentors from leading technology industry.

competitionWeek.title: Competition Week
competitionWeek.description: A full week of design competition with real-world challenges from partner companies.

recruitment.title: Recruitment
recruitment.description: Opening registration for all digital change agents
details: Early bird sold out in 2 weeks

selection.title: Selection
selection.description: Announcement of agents who passed digital selection

training.title: Training
training.description: Intensive bootcamp and mentoring with digital masters

competition.title: Competition
competition.description: Elimination round and final battle of interfaces

victory.title: Victory
victory.description: Winner announcement and legacy awards presentation

phaseTranslations.pendaftaran_desc: Official registration period for all participants
phaseTranslations.bootcamp_desc: Intensive training and skill development program
phaseTranslations.bootcamp_group_desc: Intensive training program for skill development

phaseTranslations.tahap_final_group_desc: Final stage with presentations and awards

registration.title: Registration
registration.subtitle: Investment for your digital career transformation
registration.processDesc: 3 easy steps to join the digital revolution
registration.investmentDesc: Choose an investment package that suits your digital revolution needs

fillForm.title: Fill Form
fillForm.description: Complete the registration form with personal data and portfolio (if any)

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Choose an investment package and make payment through available methods

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.description: Wait for confirmation and access to exclusive preparation materials

items.laptop: Laptop or computer with minimum specifications
items.software: Design software (Figma, Adobe XD, or Sketch)
items.internet: Stable internet connection for online sessions
items.equipment: Webcam and microphone for mentoring sessions

items.education: High school/vocational students, university students, or young professionals
items.experience: Less than 2 years experience in UI/UX field
items.commitment: Commitment to follow the entire program

common.joinDescription: Don't miss the opportunity to become part of DECOMPE 4.0 - where digital dreams become reality and visionaries like you find their stage.
common.transformDescription: Join DECOMPE 4.0 and start your journey to become a future interface designer who will change the digital world.
